Class NCAP_ETH

  • java.lang.Object
    • NCAP
      • NCAP_ETH

  • public class NCAP_ETH
extends NCAP
    This class gives a user the ability to control WTIMs through an NCAP by HTTP access. ONLY FOR ETHERNET NCAP. This class works by using the WEBPAGES of the NCAP and runs independently of them.
    Since:
    8/4/14
    Author:
    Rushad Antia
